ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Wind Waves TNR_L2_60S : 60-second Averaged Data (Range 4 - 256 kHz)
ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set contains Wind WavesThermal Noise Receiver 60-second Averaged Data (Range 4 - 256 kHz, number of channels 96).
Experimental data have been processed and averaged over 60-second intervalls from the corresponding high resolution datasets at L2 level. They are presented as temporal series. Each record consists on an averaged spectrum (given in ÂµV^2/Hz @ PA), as well as the minimum and maximum spectrum values.
Interpolations are performed in the case of missing/bad values, while the min. and max. values are left equal to -1.0e31.
The intensity modulation due to the spacecraft rotation, as well as the background level are not removed from the data.

AccessURL.Name: REGARDS
AccessURL.Description: Access via CNES Data Archive for CDPP

Parameter.Name: WIND TNR L2  60-second Averaged Power spectral density (Range 4 - 256 kHz)
